content.rendered:
Since joining AqualisBraemar in 2013, Duncan has been performing surveys for H&M, P&I, Pre-purchase, Shipyard Repairers liability (JH143), Towage, voyage approval and H&M condition. He has extensive experience of Hull, Machinery and Statutory surveys on most ship types.

Contact

Quebec | +1 514 944 0861

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: H&M damages, Hull construction and repair, New construction and ships in service classification rules and procedures
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert reports, expert opinion
